name: Voxel Defenders
description:
Gameplay:

Protect the dimensions. Every 10 seconds a new rift opens and enemies make it through to shatter the dimensional crystal. If it falls, we are doomed!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move (alt.)
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Mouse Left Click / Space: Shoot

Credits:

Developed by Tarcísio Costa and Edimilson Ribeiro da Rocha Júnior
